Texts.Chs: 现在你可以从营地中合理地获取你所需要的一切物品，那么，出发吧，祝你好运！虽说我从不相信运气这回事儿。
Texts.Eng: From there, it's all up to you. Take what you need from my camp - within reason, of course. Good luck, I suppose, but I don't believe in luck.

Texts.Chs: 我们的爆破专家，塔维什，在前方等着你，与他会合，他会让你进入目标建筑内。
Texts.Eng: Our demolitions expert, Tavish, went and set up a forward base ahead. Rendezvous with him, and he'll get you into the facility.

Texts.Chs: 就我而言，我看不出你有任何特殊之处，不过既然拉娜让你来，那么我会尊重她的选择。
Texts.Eng: Personally speaking, I don't trust the looks of you, but if Lana is vouching for you I'll defer to her judgement.

Texts.Chs: 这么说，你是拉娜派过来的人？
Texts.Eng: So, you're the special agent Lana was going to send us?

Texts.Chs: 目标建筑需要先通过这片沼泽，虽然有些难受，但这是必经之路。
Texts.Eng: The miniknog facility is up ahead through the swamp. A bit of a hellhole, but them's the breaks.
